{{Infobox Key Item |name = Safari Ticket |image = [[File:SafariTicket_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Safari Ticket''. |use = Allows entry to the [[Kanto]] Safari Zone |obtain = Clear the Fuchsia Gym in Kanto }} ===Description=== This ticket grants access to the [[Safari Zone]] in [[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Fuschia City]] ===Acquisition=== Completing the [[Gyms#Gyms|Fuschia Gym]] ===Effects=== You can now go to the [[Safari Zone]]
